channel.title: Shops
channel.description: Are there any tutorials for how to make shops sell items for tickets or like other objects or items? I looked and looked, and found nothing.. Thanks

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Doing_Cho21 Doing Cho2
item.description:
@Doing_Cho21 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:545154”][quote author=adamgulka link=topic=664036.msg4438480#msg4438480 date=1405816654]
In unpackedshops located at data/items the code should be like
26 - 995 - SHOPNAME - 14484 100

26 = shop id

995 = currency

14484 = item id in the shop

100 = number of the item in the shop.

change 995 to the ticket id, like 22989 for snowballs.
[/quote]
He has a 317, or I believe so.
Yes, there are like 1 million tutorials on this…
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/432178-pi-changing-shop-currency-coins-tokens.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/324907-pi-making-shops-accept-points-rather-than-money.html
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=499804.0[/quote]
Thank You, I forgot to look on rune-server… Stupid me.

Read full topic
